content: Agent 1: YOLOv10 Backbone - Replace backbone, update channels, add projection freezing
Agent 2: CIB & SCDown Modules - Implement CIB, C2fCIB, SCDown
Agent 3: PSA & Large Kernel - Implement PSA attention, large kernel convs
Agent 4: BlockDetector Head - YOLO-style block detection with one-to-one assignment
Agent 5: BiFPN & Rank-Guided Decoder - EfficientBiFPN, rank-guided decoder
Agent 6: Loss Functions - DualAssignmentLoss, BlockDetectionLoss, fix DBLoss beta
Agent 7: Dataset & Normalization Fix - Fix norm bug, add block annotations
Agent 8: Training Infrastructure - 3-phase trainer, gradient checkpointing
Agent 9: Export & ONNX Optimization - Update export, optimize_onnx.py, quantize.py
Agent 10: Inference Pipeline - TensorRT, CUDA graphs, async pipeline
